This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/relMedCS defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
SUBOF Substance fromSubstance from

VIRTUALPACKOF Is a Virtual Package Form ofIs a Virtual Package Form of

HASG Is a from a virtual pharmaceutical product groupIs a from a virtual pharmaceutical product group
